english: For a few minutes she was almost overcome .
chinese: 她几乎几分钟都支持不住。

english: He made it clear that he stood behind us .
chinese: 他明确表态说，他支持我们。

english: We give support to all just causes .
chinese: 凡是正义的事业，我们都给以支持。

english: With an inchoate cry she went limp .
chinese: 随着一声尖叫，她再也支持不住了。

english: He has the support and approval of the public .
chinese: 他有公众的支持和承认。
支持造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: The government has lost favour with the voters .
chinese: 政府失去了选民的支持。

english: Please come and support me . do not let me down .
There is no hard evidence to support this .
Someone must be at the back of this .
chinese: 一定有人在幕后支持这件事。

english: He lent his name to the undertaking .
chinese: 他以自己的名义支持该事业。

english: Paris will second these great efforts .
chinese: 巴黎将支持这些巨大努力。

english: He promised to support her come what may .
chinese: 他答应不论发生什么事都支持她。

english: She took sides with me against the teacher .
He had taken the measure of soviet support .
chinese: 他已经看透了苏联支持的份量。
